description:
Section 73 application for the variation to conditions 2 (approved drawings) & conditions 4 (layout of the ground floor flat) of planning consent ref P2014/0954/FUL dated 20/01/2015 for the: Erection of a five storey side extension, roof extension and lower ground floor basement level to create 4 two-bedroom flats and 1 one-bedroom flat (increase of 4 units overall). 

The variation of the approved plans condition 2 (approved drawings) and 4 (approved lower ground/ground floor layouts) seeks permission for the following alterations to the approved development: 

- increase the size of lower ground floor courtyard area.
- alter the internal arrangement to the basement and ground floor duplex unit.
- provision of refuse and cycle storage at basement level. 
- alterations to front fa√ßade including materials, window and door openings. 
- lift and common stair serve basement to top floor. 
- omission of side extension balconies and replacement with Juliette balconies plus bringing forward of building line of set back side extension.
- increase in size depth of existing front balconies.
- proposed black metal balustrading.
decision_conditions:
DRAWING AND DOCUMENT NUMBERS:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

TLNCR-SL101 REV01, TLNCR-L000, TLNCR-L001, TLNCR-E001, TLNCR-E002, TLNCR-S001, TLNCR-P001, TLNCR-P002, TLNCR-P003, Sustainable Design and Construction Statement dated September 2017, Desk Study Report dated September 2017, Ground Investigation Report and Ground Movement Analysis dated September 2017, Structural Method Statement, Written Scheme of Investigation for an Archaeological Watching Brief, Design and Access Statement dated 15.08.2017 Re 00, Daylight to Propose Accommodation dated September 2017, Planning Statement dated September 2017,  TLNCR-L101 REV12, TLNCR-P100 REV12, TLNCR-P101 REV12, TLNCR-P102 REV12, TLNCR-P103 REV12, TLNCR-P104 REV12, TLNCR-P105 REV12, TLNCR-E101 REV12,TLNCR-E102 REV12 & TLNCR-S101 REV12.

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
